content: worked side-to-side this striped crochet blanket is an eye-catching layer that will instantly brighten any room what seems like a simple design becomes an exciting challenge with double_crochet granny stitches and clever color changes creating a stunning pattern of vibrant diamonds made with our perfectly plush bernat blanket you can customize colors to create any mood packed with fun techniques to keep you engaged this project is as enjoyable to make as it is to admire materials bernat® blanket ™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m main color mc vintage white 10006 4 balls or 757 yds/692 m contrast a shadow purple 10882 2 balls or 266 yds/243 m contrast b pumpkin spice 10630 1 ball or 213 yds/195 m contrast c burnt mustard 10874 1 ball or 213 yds/195 m contrast d light teal 10734 1 ball or 213 yds/195 m
